title: What are some examples of useful beliefs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Belief in oneself leads to confidence and a willingness to proceed despite risk. This is particularly important in sports competitions, for instance: A baseball player with a batting average of .400 fails more often than he succeeds. So, strictly data-driven beliefs say he won't succeed this time at bat. But if he apprpatches the plate filled with belief he will succeed this time, it actually increases his odds of success. This is a very useful belief, which happens to be false!

A belief in moral or ethical principles is vital to a good life. A belief in self education or self improvement will often make you a better human with greater understanding of what your abilities are and how you can improve upon them. A belief that life is a struggle through ups and downs in life where you will benefit in the long duration if you keep going with courage, integrity, dependability, trustworthiness, competence, friendliness, caring, empathy, determination, ambition, etc.
